title: "New machine learning-based tool to help physicians determine best test for chest pain"
excerpt: "The choice between two non-invasive diagnostic tests is a common dilemma in patients who present with chest pain. Yale cardiologist Rohan Khera, MD, MS, and colleagues have developed ASSIST, a new digital decision-aiding tool."
